name: Priso SpaceFight
description:
Maneuver, shoot asteroids, and head for the stars!

In this arcade-style game, you are a space traveler that got into a huge asteroid field.

You have a double laser on the ship, but it has a cooldown, so you have to think strategically to avoid them or shoot them. 

The game gets gradually faster and faster, and the only goal is to survive.

Have fun! Source code: https://github.com/Laky730/3D-spaceGame
